title: Table Cover, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk and metal embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker
description: Square made up from small squares of embroidery joined with insertions of torchon lace. Large center square has stylized sprig repeat.

tombstone.epitaph:
Table Cover, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: silk and metal embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered on plain weave. Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker. 1955-133-38.
